original_text: And now, behold, I know well that thou shalt surely be king, and that the kingdom of Israel shall be established in thine hand.
korean_text: 보라 나는 네가 반드시 왕이 될 것을 알고 이스라엘 나라가 네 손에 견고히 설 것을 아노니

sentences.original_text: that thou shalt surely be king
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 반드시 왕이 될 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: and that the kingdom of Israel
shall be established in thine hand
